## Source: ossf-package-analysis (dbfd2a12ff91b5671296af36374207f6088d354cc6e39df805bc7bce975abc33)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bytekafka' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
